entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
